coreAttributes.name: tits bat
coreAttributes.description: A smooth wooden club hides the ancient power of the breast shamans of old.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(ready)] [npc.her] wooden bat in anticipation of bigger tits.

hitDescriptions.hitText: #IF (2 + npc2.getBreastRawSizeValue() < 80) #THEN [#npc2.incrementBreastSize(2)] #ELSE #ENDIF [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] wooden bat at [npc2.name], grinning as it connects with [npc2.her] body!

#IF (2 + npc2.getBreastRawSizeValue() < 80) #THEN [#npc2.incrementBreastSize(2)] #ELSE #ENDIF Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] wooden bat, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as it strikes [npc2.herHim] on the [npc2.arm]!

#IF (2 + npc2.getBreastRawSizeValue() < 80) #THEN [#npc2.incrementBreastSize(2)] #ELSE #ENDIF [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swipe)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] wooden bat, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(get)] whacked in the [npc2.arm]!

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(swing)] [npc.her] wooden bat at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Striking out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] wooden bat, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(swipe)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] wooden bat, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
